channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: What happens next in Iran after Ayatollah Khamenei’s death?
Word of the Week is Durand Line. How a British-drawn border is at the heart of the Pakistan-Afghanistan ‘open war’
Who’s who in Ayatollah Khamenei’s family? How many have survived US-Israel strikes on Iran?
This Week in Explainers: Why is Iran attacking the UAE, Bahrain and other Gulf nations?
IRGC vows ‘most powerful operation’ after Khamenei killed: What is this brutal armed force?
Dubai airport, iconic Palm Jumeirah hit: How and why the emirate is facing Iran’s wrath
How PM Modi’s Israel visit has created a rare opportunity to turn vision into reality
item.description: Israel must seize this moment to build a genuinely strategic partnership with the world's fastest-rising power

item.title: Paranoid Trump is trying to constrict India’s policy autonomy, but we are the new indispensable power
item.description: The world, especially the middle powers and the Global South, want India to be successful and are vesting in its success

item.title: All is not well with CPEC: China’s security demands are shrinking Pakistan’s strategic space
item.description: The China-Pakistan Economic Corridor was initially marketed as an expansive and open-ended partnership. It now appears to be transitioning into a more risk-managed and disciplined phase

item.title: How Modi and Xi present contrasting models of parliamentary outreach and global influence
item.description: PM Modi’s 19 parliamentary speeches, compared to Xi’s few, show that soft power thrives on authenticity, inclusion, and respect for institutions. They challenge China’s dominance narrative and demonstrate that emerging powers can build influence through democratic dialogue, not just summits and boardrooms

item.title: This Holi, skip the rush: Explore the hidden Mewar around Udaipur
item.description: When Udaipur feels overrun, the real magic of Mewar begins just beyond its city limits

item.title: India in the energy great game: Safeguarding strategic autonomy and leading the Global South
item.description: Energy security remains the foundational driver of global geopolitics, and India’s strategic autonomy in the emerging energy great game will determine its role as both a major power and a champion of the Global South
